<a id="class_LinkButton"></a>

# LinkButton

**Inherits:** [BaseButton](class_basebutton.md) **<** [Control](class_control.md) **<** [CanvasItem](class_canvasitem.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A button that represents a link.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A button that represents a link. This type of button is primarily used for interactions that cause a context change (like linking to a web page).

See also [BaseButton](class_basebutton.md) which contains common properties and methods associated with this node.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_LinkButton_UnderlineMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **UnderlineMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_LinkButton_UnderlineMode)

<a id="class_LinkButton_constant_UNDERLINE_MODE_ALWAYS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[UnderlineMode](class_linkbutton.md#enum_LinkButton_UnderlineMode) **UNDERLINE_MODE_ALWAYS** = `0`

The LinkButton will always show an underline at the bottom of its text.<a id="class_LinkButton_constant_UNDERLINE_MODE_ON_HOVER"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[UnderlineMode](class_linkbutton.md#enum_LinkButton_UnderlineMode) **UNDERLINE_MODE_ON_HOVER** = `1`

The LinkButton will show an underline at the bottom of its text when the mouse cursor is over it.<a id="class_LinkButton_constant_UNDERLINE_MODE_NEVER"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[UnderlineMode](class_linkbutton.md#enum_LinkButton_UnderlineMode) **UNDERLINE_MODE_NEVER** = `2`

The LinkButton will never show an underline at the bottom of its text.<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-property -->

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [String](class_string.md) **get_language**\ (\ )

Language code used for line-breaking and text shaping algorithms, if left empty current locale is used instead.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LinkButton_property_uri"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](class_string.md) **uri** = `""` [ðŸ”—](#class_LinkButton_property_uri)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_uri**\ (\ value\: [String](class_string.md)\ )
- [String](class_string.md) **get_uri**\ (\ )

The [URI](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uniform_Resource_Identifier) for this **LinkButton**. If set to a valid URI, pressing the button opens the URI using the operating system's default program for the protocol (via [OS.shell_open()](class_os.md#class_OS_method_shell_open)). HTTP and HTTPS URLs open the default web browser.




```gdscript
    uri = "https://godotengine.org"  # Opens the URL in the default web browser.
    uri = "C:\SomeFolder"  # Opens the file explorer at the given path.
    uri = "C:\SomeImage.png"  # Opens the given image in the default viewing app.
```

```csharp
    Uri = "https://godotengine.org"; // Opens the URL in the default web browser.
    Uri = "C:\SomeFolder"; // Opens the file explorer at the given path.
    Uri = "C:\SomeImage.png"; // Opens the given image in the default viewing app.
```

## Theme Property Descriptions

<a id="class_LinkButton_theme_color_font_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](class_color.md) **font_color** = `Color(0.875, 0.875, 0.875, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#class_LinkButton_theme_color_font_color)

Default text [Color](class_color.md) of the **LinkButton**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LinkButton_theme_color_font_disabled_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](class_color.md) **font_disabled_color** = `Color(0, 0, 0, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#class_LinkButton_theme_color_font_disabled_color)

Text [Color](class_color.md) used when the **LinkButton** is disabled.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LinkButton_theme_color_font_focus_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](class_color.md) **font_focus_color** = `Color(0.95, 0.95, 0.95, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#class_LinkButton_theme_color_font_focus_color)

Text [Color](class_color.md) used when the **LinkButton** is focused. Only replaces the normal text color of the button. Disabled, hovered, and pressed states take precedence over this color.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LinkButton_theme_color_font_hover_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](class_color.md) **font_hover_color** = `Color(0.95, 0.95, 0.95, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#class_LinkButton_theme_color_font_hover_color)

Text [Color](class_color.md) used when the **LinkButton** is being hovered.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LinkButton_theme_color_font_hover_pressed_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](class_color.md) **font_hover_pressed_color** = `Color(0, 0, 0, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#class_LinkButton_theme_color_font_hover_pressed_color)

Text [Color](class_color.md) used when the **LinkButton** is being hovered and pressed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LinkButton_theme_color_font_outline_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](class_color.md) **font_outline_color** = `Color(0, 0, 0, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#class_LinkButton_theme_color_font_outline_color)

The tint of text outline of the **LinkButton**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LinkButton_theme_color_font_pressed_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](class_color.md) **font_pressed_color** = `Color(1, 1, 1, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#class_LinkButton_theme_color_font_pressed_color)

Text [Color](class_color.md) used when the **LinkButton** is being pressed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LinkButton_theme_constant_outline_size"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](class_int.md) **outline_size** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_LinkButton_theme_constant_outline_size)

The size of the text outline.

\ **Note:** If using a font with [FontFile.multichannel_signed_distance_field](class_fontfile.md#class_FontFile_property_multichannel_signed_distance_field) enabled, its [FontFile.msdf_pixel_range](class_fontfile.md#class_FontFile_property_msdf_pixel_range) must be set to at least *twice* the value of [outline_size](class_linkbutton.md#class_LinkButton_theme_constant_outline_size) for outline rendering to look correct. Otherwise, the outline may appear to be cut off earlier than intended.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LinkButton_theme_constant_underline_spacing"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](class_int.md) **underline_spacing** = `2` [ðŸ”—](#class_LinkButton_theme_constant_underline_spacing)

The vertical space between the baseline of text and the underline.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LinkButton_theme_font_font"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Font](class_font.md) **font** [ðŸ”—](#class_LinkButton_theme_font_font)

[Font](class_font.md) of the **LinkButton**'s text.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LinkButton_theme_font_size_font_size"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](class_int.md) **font_size** [ðŸ”—](#class_LinkButton_theme_font_size_font_size)

Font size of the **LinkButton**'s text.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LinkButton_theme_style_focus"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](class_stylebox.md) **focus** [ðŸ”—](#class_LinkButton_theme_style_focus)

[StyleBox](class_stylebox.md) used when the **LinkButton** is focused. The [focus](class_linkbutton.md#class_LinkButton_theme_style_focus) [StyleBox](class_stylebox.md) is displayed *over* the base [StyleBox](class_stylebox.md), so a partially transparent [StyleBox](class_stylebox.md) should be used to ensure the base [StyleBox](class_stylebox.md) remains visible. A [StyleBox](class_stylebox.md) that represents an outline or an underline works well for this purpose. To disable the focus visual effect, assign a [StyleBoxEmpty](class_styleboxempty.md) resource. Note that disabling the focus visual effect will harm keyboard/controller navigation usability, so this is not recommended for accessibility reasons.
